name: TheTransitOracle(BusPredictionsforSFMuni)
0:
”Alexa ask the transit oracle when the next inbound 24 is coming”
”Alexa ask the transit oracle for the outbound 33”
”Alexa ask the transit oracle when the inbound N Judah is coming”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the transit oracle
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Uses your address to tell you the next bus time for the given route and direction. Works for SF Muni using the NextBus.

Your full address is required to use this skill. 

Reach out if you find a bug to satshabad.music+busoracle@gmail.com.

Icon by: https://www.iconfinder.com/arunxthomas
